actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require the Attorney General to investigate all vertical concentrations within the petroleum industry and to take such action as is necessary to prevent illegal concentrations.

summary.text: Requires the Attorney General to investigate all vertical concentrations within the petroleum industry and to take such action as is necessary to prevent illegal concentrations.

titles.title: A bill to require the Attorney General to investigate all vertical concentrations within the petroleum industry and to take such action as is necessary to prevent illegal concentrations.
